title: Power Grid Corp acquires 2 special purpose vehicles to implement transmission projects
description: The Koppal II Gadag II Transmission Ltd (KIIGIITL) was acquired on Tuesday to establish a transmission system for 'Transmission Scheme for Integration of Renewable Energy Zone (Phase-II) in Koppal-II (Phase-A & B) and GadagII (Phase-A) in Karnataka', on build, own, operate and transfer (BOOT) basis", it explained.
